abstract: Federal Reserve and Office of Comptroller of the Currency invite public to open meeting in Los Angeles on $3.4 billion merger of CIT Group and OneWest bank; hear many comments about banks investing in local communities, particularly from banks that got federal bailouts.
lead_paragraph: Federal regulators and the chiefs of the CIT Group and OneWest got an earful on the need for more investment in the community, especially from two banks that got federal aid.

headline.main: In Unusual Step, Regulators Invite Public to Open Meeting on Bank Merger
headline.print_headline: In Unusual Step, Regulators Invite Public to Open Meeting on Bank Merger

snippet: Federal regulators and the chiefs of the CIT Group and OneWest got an earful on the need for more investment in the community, especially from two banks that got federal aid.
